content: Should we tag, label or prefix the GFs we open during QA?
If it's a QA-issue, it should be in the documents you're preparing. If it's some other change request discovered while doing QA review, then it's no different than any oteher change request

Thanks!
I was referring to the "this paragraph needs work" -kind of GF that happen during QA. I had a couple of those :)
